mapper.sql: a.order_id AS "orderId", a.api_order_id AS "apiOrderId", a.area_id AS "area.id", a.area_name AS "areaName", a.baili_synchor_state AS "bailiSynchorState", a.brand_id AS "brandId", a.brand_name AS "brandName", a.carr_id AS "carrId", a.channel_confirm_time AS "channelConfirmTime", a.channel_ems_price AS "channelEmsPrice", a.channel_id AS "channelId", a.channel_name AS "channelName", a.channel_send_time AS "channelSendTime", a.channels_before AS "channelsBefore", a.channels_num_before AS "channelsNumBefore", a.check_user_id AS "checkUserId", a.check_user_name AS "checkUserName", a.city_id AS "cityId", a.city_name AS "cityName", a.cost_ems_price AS "costEmsPrice", a.cust_addr AS "custAddr", a.cust_name AS "custName", a.cust_tel AS "custTel", a.custom_order_id AS "customOrderId", a.discount AS "discount", a.ems_comp AS "emsComp", a.ems_comp_ori AS "emsCompOri", a.ems_nbr AS "emsNbr", a.ems_price AS "emsPrice", a.err_msg AS "errMsg", a.fact_carr_id AS "factCarrId", a.fact_discount AS "factDiscount", a.fact_ems_comp AS "factEmsComp", a.fact_ems_price AS "factEmsPrice", a.fact_goods_count AS "factGoodsCount", a.gender_id AS "genderId", a.gender_name AS "genderName", a.goods_count AS "goodsCount", a.goods_nbr AS "goodsNbr", a.goods_price AS "goodsPrice", a.goods_size AS "goodsSize", a.goods_type_id AS "goodsTypeId", a.goods_type_name AS "goodsTypeName", a.is_invoice AS "isInvoice", a.is_service AS "isService", a.numiid AS "numiid", a.order_fahuo_state AS "orderFahuoState", a.order_ip AS "orderIp", a.order_parent_id AS "orderParentId", a.order_price AS "orderPrice", a.order_price_pre AS "orderPricePre", a.order_state AS "orderState", a.order_state_time AS "orderStateTime", a.order_sub_nos AS "orderSubNos", a.order_time AS "orderTime", a.order_user_id AS "orderUserId", a.order_user_name AS "orderUserName", a.ori_nbr AS "oriNbr", a.ori_size AS "oriSize", a.platform_agio AS "platformAgio", a.platform_deduct AS "platformDeduct", a.platform_freight AS "platformFreight", a.platform_freight_pre AS "platformFreightPre", a.province_id AS "provinceId", a.province_name AS "provinceName", a.remark AS "remark", a.season_id AS "seasonId", a.season_name AS "seasonName", a.shop_id AS "shopId", a.shop_name AS "shopName", a.status AS "status", a.tid AS "tid", a.package_price AS "packagePrice", a.logistics_type AS "logisticsType", a.declaration_form_date AS "declarationFormDate", a.order_src AS "orderSrc", a.import_over_price AS "importOverPrice", a.order_date AS "orderDate", a.over_time AS "overTime", a.import_ems_price AS "importEmsPrice", a3.name AS "area.name"
LEFT JOIN sys_area a3 ON a3.id = a.area_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fx_orders( order_id, api_order_id, area_id, area_name, baili_synchor_state, brand_id, brand_name, carr_id, channel_confirm_time, channel_ems_price, channel_id, channel_name, channel_send_time, channels_before, channels_num_before, check_user_id, check_user_name, city_id, city_name, cost_ems_price, cust_addr, cust_name, cust_tel, custom_order_id, discount, ems_comp, ems_comp_ori, ems_nbr, ems_price, err_msg, fact_carr_id, fact_discount, fact_ems_comp, fact_ems_price, fact_goods_count, gender_id, gender_name, goods_count, goods_nbr, goods_price, goods_size, goods_type_id, goods_type_name, is_invoice, is_service, numiid, order_fahuo_state, order_ip, order_parent_id, order_price, order_price_pre, order_state, order_state_time, order_sub_nos, order_time, order_user_id, order_user_name, ori_nbr, ori_size, platform_agio, platform_deduct, platform_freight, platform_freight_pre, province_id, province_name, remark, season_id, season_name, shop_id, shop_name, status, tid, package_price, logistics_type, declaration_form_date, order_src, import_over_price, order_date, over_time, import_ems_price ) VALUES ( #{orderId}, #{apiOrderId}, #{area.id}, #{areaName}, #{bailiSynchorState}, #{brandId}, #{brandName}, #{carrId}, #{channelConfirmTime}, #{channelEmsPrice}, #{channelId}, #{channelName}, #{channelSendTime}, #{channelsBefore}, #{channelsNumBefore}, #{checkUserId}, #{checkUserName}, #{cityId}, #{cityName}, #{costEmsPrice}, #{custAddr}, #{custName}, #{custTel}, #{customOrderId}, #{discount}, #{emsComp}, #{emsCompOri}, #{emsNbr}, #{emsPrice}, #{errMsg}, #{factCarrId}, #{factDiscount}, #{factEmsComp}, #{factEmsPrice}, #{factGoodsCount}, #{genderId}, #{genderName}, #{goodsCount}, #{goodsNbr}, #{goodsPrice}, #{goodsSize}, #{goodsTypeId}, #{goodsTypeName}, #{isInvoice}, #{isService}, #{numiid}, #{orderFahuoState}, #{orderIp}, #{orderParentId}, #{orderPrice}, #{orderPricePre}, #{orderState}, #{orderStateTime}, #{orderSubNos}, #{orderTime}, #{orderUserId}, #{orderUserName}, #{oriNbr}, #{oriSize}, #{platformAgio}, #{platformDeduct}, #{platformFreight}, #{platformFreightPre}, #{provinceId}, #{provinceName}, #{remark}, #{seasonId}, #{seasonName}, #{shopId}, #{shopName}, #{status}, #{tid}, #{packagePrice}, #{logisticsType}, #{declarationFormDate}, #{orderSrc}, #{importOverPrice}, #{orderDate}, #{overTime}, #{importEmsPrice} )
mapper.update: UPDATE fx_orders SET order_id = #{orderId}, api_order_id = #{apiOrderId}, area_id = #{area.id}, area_name = #{areaName}, baili_synchor_state = #{bailiSynchorState}, brand_id = #{brandId}, brand_name = #{brandName}, carr_id = #{carrId}, channel_confirm_time = #{channelConfirmTime}, channel_ems_price = #{channelEmsPrice}, channel_id = #{channelId}, channel_name = #{channelName}, channel_send_time = #{channelSendTime}, channels_before = #{channelsBefore}, channels_num_before = #{channelsNumBefore}, check_user_id = #{checkUserId}, check_user_name = #{checkUserName}, city_id = #{cityId}, city_name = #{cityName}, cost_ems_price = #{costEmsPrice}, cust_addr = #{custAddr}, cust_name = #{custName}, cust_tel = #{custTel}, custom_order_id = #{customOrderId}, discount = #{discount}, ems_comp = #{emsComp}, ems_comp_ori = #{emsCompOri}, ems_nbr = #{emsNbr}, ems_price = #{emsPrice}, err_msg = #{errMsg}, fact_carr_id = #{factCarrId}, fact_discount = #{factDiscount}, fact_ems_comp = #{factEmsComp}, fact_ems_price = #{factEmsPrice}, fact_goods_count = #{factGoodsCount}, gender_id = #{genderId}, gender_name = #{genderName}, goods_count = #{goodsCount}, goods_nbr = #{goodsNbr}, goods_price = #{goodsPrice}, goods_size = #{goodsSize}, goods_type_id = #{goodsTypeId}, goods_type_name = #{goodsTypeName}, is_invoice = #{isInvoice}, is_service = #{isService}, numiid = #{numiid}, order_fahuo_state = #{orderFahuoState}, order_ip = #{orderIp}, order_parent_id = #{orderParentId}, order_price = #{orderPrice}, order_price_pre = #{orderPricePre}, order_state = #{orderState}, order_state_time = #{orderStateTime}, order_sub_nos = #{orderSubNos}, order_time = #{orderTime}, order_user_id = #{orderUserId}, order_user_name = #{orderUserName}, ori_nbr = #{oriNbr}, ori_size = #{oriSize}, platform_agio = #{platformAgio}, platform_deduct = #{platformDeduct}, platform_freight = #{platformFreight}, platform_freight_pre = #{platformFreightPre}, province_id = #{provinceId}, province_name = #{provinceName}, remark = #{remark}, season_id = #{seasonId}, season_name = #{seasonName}, shop_id = #{shopId}, shop_name = #{shopName}, status = #{status}, tid = #{tid}, package_price = #{packagePrice}, logistics_type = #{logisticsType}, declaration_form_date = #{declarationFormDate}, order_src = #{orderSrc}, import_over_price = #{importOverPrice}, order_date = #{orderDate}, over_time = #{overTime}, import_ems_price = #{importEmsPrice} WHERE id = #{id}
